entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers and flurries this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 40%
